mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feedback (id, qid, uid, too_fast, too_slow, boring, bad_question, comment, created_at) VALUES (NULL, #{qid}, #{uid}, #{tooFast}, #{tooSlow}, #{boring}, #{badQuestion}, #{comment}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(too_fast) as tooFastCount, SUM(too_slow) as tooSlowCount, SUM(boring) as boringCount, SUM(bad_question) as badQuestionCount, COUNT(*) as totalFeedbackCount FROM feedback WHERE qid = #{qid}

SELECT id, qid, uid, too_fast as tooFast, too_slow as tooSlow, boring, bad_question as badQuestion, comment, created_at as createdAt FROM feedback WHERE qid = #{qid} AND comment IS NOT NULL AND comment != '' ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, qid, uid, too_fast as tooFast, too_slow as tooSlow, boring, bad_question as badQuestion, comment, created_at as createdAt FROM feedback WHERE uid = #{uid} AND qid = #{qid} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE feedback SET too_fast = #{tooFast}, too_slow = #{tooSlow}, boring = #{boring}, bad_question = #{badQuestion}, comment = #{comment} WHERE id = #{id}
